thoughts.text: I think I should start by analyzing some code.
thoughts.reasoning: Analyzing code will give me a better understanding of the problem at hand and help me determine the next steps.

- Analyze the code provided
- Determine what the code does
- Look for any potential issues or optimizations
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure I don't spend too much time analyzing the code and get stuck in analysis paralysis.
thoughts.speak: I think I should start by analyzing the code.
